original_text: When they pray to you, please hear them from your home in heaven. Do what is right to help them win against their enemies.
korean_text: 주는 하늘에서 그들의 기도와 간구를 들으시고 그들의 일을 돌아보옵소서

sentences.original_text: please hear them from your home in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 있는 당신의 집에서 그들을 들어주십시오

sentences.original_text: to help them win against their enemies
